鞈字的基本解释

鞈
gé
古代用皮革制的扩胸甲：“轻罪入以兰盾、鞈革、二戟。”
坚硬：“楚人鲛革犀兕以为甲，鞈如金石。”

鞈
tà
古同“??”：“金鼓迭起，铿鎗闛鞈。”

鞈
sǎ
古同“靸”。

鞈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gé］
［《廣韻》古沓切，入合，見。］
［《廣韻》古洽切，入洽，見。］
(1)古代革制的胸甲。
(2)坚固貌。
[②]［tà］
［《集韻》託合切，入合，透。］
鼓声。

鞈字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞈； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1387第14
【唐韻】古洽切【集韻】訖洽切，?音夾。【說文】防汗也。【玉篇】橐也。以防捍也。【荀子·議兵篇】鞈如金石。【註】鞈，堅貌。　又【管子·中匡篇】輕罪入蘭、盾、鞈革三戟。【註】蘭，卽蘭錡，兵架也。鞈革，重革當心著之，所以禦兵。　又【廣韻】古沓切【集韻】葛合切，?音閤。義同。【集韻】或作䩡。　又【集韻】悉合切，音趿。與靸同。　又䶀古作鞈。註詳鼓部六畫。或作鞜。　又託合切，音錔。本作鞳。或作?䶀闒。詳後鞳字註。

鞈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鞈字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Jade
gé
An ancient breastplate made of leather: "Misdemeanors were guilty of blue shields, daggers, and halberds."
Hard: "The people of Chu think that they are armor, and they are like gold and stone."
Jade
tà
Gu Tong's "??": "The golden drums are rising, the guns and the spears."
Jade
sǎ
Ancient Tong "靸".

[①]［gé］
["Guangyun" Guta cut, join together, see. ]
["Guangyun" Ancient Qiaqi, enter Qia, see you. ]
(1) Ancient leather breastplate.
(2) Robust appearance.
[②]［tà］
["Jiyun" supports close, close, and through. ]
drum.

[Tang Yun] Ancient Qiaqie [Jiyun] Long Qiaqie, sound clip. [Said the text] Anti-sweat also. 【Jade articles】Also. Just to guard against it. 【Xunzi·Meeting on Soldiers】The Dian is like a stone. [Note] Mian, strong appearance.　[Guan Zi·Zhong Kuang Chapter] Misdemeanor into the blue, shield, and leather trident. [Note] Lan, 卽兰锜, battalion also. Dan leather, heavy leather, beware of it, so imperial soldiers.　[Guangyun] Gutaqie [Jiyun] Ge co-cut,? Sound cohesive. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] or as a master.　[Jiyun] The sound is singularly close. Same as Lu.　 You Ji Gu Zuo Xian. Note the six paintings of the drum in detail. Or do it.　Take it again, the sound is chi.
